description: Dashboard for Micrometer(Java, Spring Boot, Actuator)

alert.name: Dubbo Request Success Rate is Low

targets.expr: sum by (namespace,pod, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="vpay", status!~"5.."}[2m]))/sum by (namespace,pod, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="vpay", status!~"5.."}[2m]))
avg by (namespace,pod, cause) (rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{application="vpay", action="end of major GC"}[2m]))

title: vpay
